main event: Multiple sightings of bright, unidentified flying objects were reported in Boyertown, Pennsylvania on April 9, 1965.
interesting points: The observer described the light as extremely bright, pulsating, and changing colors from white to red to green., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes and was seen by the observer and his wife., The object appeared to hover and move in an east-northeast direction., M/SGT. Stricland received the report and initiated an investigation by Project Blue Book., The weather conditions at the time were clear, with no clouds obstructing the view.
sighted object: An extremely bright light in the sky
witness description: The witness was Mr. Charles A. Howe and his wife.
